COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix equality bug in `WaitForIndexColorStep` The `indexNameSupplier` was included in the equality and is of type `BiFunction`, which doesn't implement a proper `equals` method by default - and thus neither do the lambdas. This meant that two instances of this step would only be considered equal if they were the same instance. By excluding `indexNameSupplier` from the `equals` method, we ensure the method works as intended and is able to properly tell the equality between two instances. As a side effect, we expect/hope this change will fix a number of tests that were failing because `WaitForIndexColorStep` missed the last cluster state update in the test, causing ILM to get stuck and the test to time out. Fixes #125683 Fixes #125789 Fixes #125867 Fixes #125911 Fixes #126053 Fixes #126354
